price: Estos son ejemplos que doy a la gente, pero solo los comprenden quienes reflexionan.
arabic: وَتِلۡكَ ٱلۡأَمۡثَٰلُ نَضۡرِبُهَا لِلنَّاسِۖ وَمَا يَعۡقِلُهَآ إِلَّا ٱلۡعَٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: watil'ka al-amthālu naḍribuhā lilnnāsi wamā yaʿqiluhā illā al-ʿālimūna
